Articles.Content: Ah! There you are. I am Lord Wasteland. Those on the orbiter-forum know me as well. I have played KSP for three weeks, and finally bought it.

Welcome! This is a great game to jump to from Orbiter.

'Uhm... Help?'

If I had a nickel for every time a Kerbal said that..

Welcome! This is a great game to jump to from Orbiter.

'Uhm... Help?'

If I had a nickel for every time a Kerbal said that..

You\'d be a freaking gazillionaire

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to the Kerbal Space Program Forums, Lord Wasteland.

Scruce from Orbiter-Forum aswell.
Welcome, youa re just in time before KSP explodes everywhere!

Welcome, youa re just in time before KSP explodes everywhere!

I don\'t know about that... Do you consider the start of the explosion to be at the first strong spark, or is only an explosion when most of the fuel is burning? \'Cause that spark was a few days ago.
